title: Chat Restriction
body: I was chat restricted for 10 games, and it said i am unable to earn loot, does this mean I cannot earn my first win of the day bonus anymore as well?

replies.body: LOL u think u have it bad i have to wait 5 minutes before i can find a game because I left a match!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=DBmaster,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=El520pEB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-17T07:35:03.984+0000)
>
> LOL u think u have it bad i have to wait 5 minutes before i can find a game because I left a match!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

you got off lightly... stop complaining, don't AFK. It ruins everyone's game.
First win of the day isn't classed as loot, so you'll still get those. Loot only refers to the hextech loot.
